snippet: North Korea’s Musudan missile threatens the security of America and its allies. President Obama should order a narrow, defensive strike before it’s launched.
lead_paragraph: North Korea’s Musudan missile threatens the security of America and its allies. President Obama should order a narrow, defensive strike before it’s launched.
